# Ignore temp files, build results, and other unnecessary files.
/[Ll]ibrary/
[Ll]ibrary/
[Tt]emp/
[Oo]bj/
[Bb]uild/
[Bb]uilds/
[Ll]ogs/
UserSettings/

# Autogenerated VS/MD solution and project files
*.csproj
*.unityproj
*.sln
*.suo
*.user
*.userprefs
*.pidb
*.booproj
*.svd

# Unity3D generated file on crash reports
sysinfo.txt

# Ignore crash reports, moodle, and all unimportant files
sysinfo.txt
sys_report.txt

# Visual Studio Code metadata
.vscode/

# Rider
.idea/
*.sln.iml

# Unity Asset Store tools
[Assets]/AssetStoreTools*

# Plugin directories
Assets/Plugins/*/source/
Assets/Plugins/*/android/
Assets/Plugins/*/ios/
